original_title: Dancing Around the Shit Fire with Kyle Kinane
overview: Kyle Kinane is back with a brand new hourlong comedy show and he’s brought a few friends along. Shot June 14, 2013 in Chicago as part of the Just for Laughs Comedy Festival, Dancing Around the Shit Fire is a no holds barred, uncensored romp featuring Kyle Kinane and comics Bryan Cook (Competitive Erotic Fan Fiction) and Ben Roy (Those Who Can’t) with musical guest Brendan Kelly from The Lawrence Arms.  It’s Kinane’s personal “love letter” to his hometown of Chicago, as he returns to a sold out crowd to confess his hilariously true stories and hijinks of living in the ‘Windy City’.
tagline: A comedy show and a love letter to my hometown of Chicago, all in one heaping brew of frothy goodness.
title: Dancing Around the Shit Fire with Kyle Kinane
